roleset.name: to make or become full, containing, up to capacity

example.name: fill-v: all arguments
example.text: Outside, a young pressman filling a news box with an extra edition headlined ``Herald Examiner Closes'' refused to take areader's quarter.
example.arg: with an extra edition headlined ``Herald Examiner Closes''

example.name: fill-v: with Arg1 and Arg2
example.text: In this one, the screen fills with photographs of both candidates.

example.name: fill-v
example.text: The dispute has hampered the administration's efforts to recruit prominent doctors [0]-1 []to fill prestigious posts atthe helm of the NIH and the Centers for Disease Control.
example.arg: prestigious posts atthe helm of the NIH and the Centers for Disease Control.

example.name: fill-v: with Arg0 and Arg1
example.text: Hungary's Parliament voted to hold a national referendum on an election [*]to fill the new post of president.

example.name: filling-n: arg1
example.text: No part of any appropriation for the current fiscal year contained in this or any other Act shall be paid to any person for the filling of any position for which he or she has been nominatedafter the Senate has voted not to approve the nomination of saidperson . ''
example.arg: filling of any position for which he or she has been nominatedafter the Senate has voted not to approve the nomination of

example.name: filling-n: Not Events!! Call .YY.
example.text: Spoon on some filling ; pineapple , cherry , apple , pumpkin -LRB- pick one -RRB- fold the dough over to cover the filling andpinch the edges together .He has a significant number of uh fillings /.

example.name: filling-n: arg2
example.text: They worked out a cement filling mining method , so that the average quantity mined per person per shift is 17.6 tons , reachingan internationally advanced level .

roleset.note: FILL-V NOTES: Member of VNcls fill-9.8, cother_cos-45.4, ontiguous_location-47.8. (from fill.01-v)
FULL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, comparison to fill-v.01.Corresponds to VNcls fill-9.8, cother_cos-45.4,ontiguous_location-47.8. (from full.01-j)

roleset.name: fulfill, satisfy

example.name: fill-v: damn stock reportage anyway
example.text: [The order]-1 was filled *trace*-1 at $75 when the stockopened at that price on Monday.
example.arg: when the stockopened at that price on Monday.

example.name: fill-v: all args
example.text: As part of the crew for The Beach, Hilary filled the requirement as Safety Diver and at times swimming alongside thePalm Tree laden barge from open water to shore, ensuring a safeclearance from the coral heads in the bay.
example.arg: As part of the crew for The Beach,
as Safety Diver and at times swimming alongside thePalm Tree laden barge from open water to shore, ensuring a safeclearance from the coral heads in the bay.

example.name: filling-n: Arg1 only
example.text: ...he met nothing charged in the whole process from outpatient service to prescription making and prescription filling .

roleset.note: FILLING-N NOTES: Based on instances in BOLT P01, part 7. Framed by Claire.Related to verb entry fill.06 (from filling.03-n)

roleset.name: fill up: to make or become full

example.name: fill_up-v: with Arg0 and Arg1
example.text: It also empowers the president to make recess appointments, without Senate approval: ``[The President]-1 shall have Power [*]-1to fill up all Vacancies that may happen during the Recess of theSenate, by granting Commissions which shall expire at the End oftheir next Session.''
example.arg: up all Vacancies that may happen during the Recess of theSenate,
by granting Commissions which shall expire at the End oftheir next Session.''

roleset.note: FILL_UP-V NOTES: See VNcls fill-9.8, cother_cos-45.4, ontiguous_location-47.8, but verb particle constructions are notincluded in VN. (from fill.02-v)

roleset.name: fill out: to complete, fill in

role.descr: agent, poor schmuck with a pen

example.name: fill_out-v: gerund
example.text: [*] Filling out detailed forms about these individuals wouldtip the IRS off and spark action against the clients, he said.

example.name: fill_out-v: collect a full set
example.text: NCNB-1 raised some $1.9 billion in new capital during the quarter *-1 to complete the NCNB Texas purchase , and to acquire several small failed thrifts [*] to fill out its regional franchise.

roleset.name: fill in, to complete

role.descr: agent, poor schmuck with a pen

example.name: fill_in-v: gerund
example.text: [*] Filling in detailed forms about these individuals wouldtip the IRS off and spark action against the clients, he said.

example.name: fill_in-v: with arg2
example.text: But , importantly , you can do it yourself by *PRO* simply downloading a form and filling in the details .

example.name: filling_in-n
example.text: The filling in of filter tips with acetate fiber

roleset.note: FILLING_IN-N NOTES: Comparison to fill.05. No vncls. (from filling.02-n)

role.descr: person, thing acting as something else

example.name: fill_in-v: substitute
example.text: ...I 'm Paula Zahn filling in for the two men Anderson Cooper and Aaron Brown.
example.arg: for the two men Anderson Cooper and Aaron Brown.

roleset.name: provide with info/details

example.name: fill_in-v: args 1,2
example.text: I wo n't be far at all !! I do expect to be filled in on work happenings

roleset.name: complete, contain the maximum possible amount

role.descr: thing contained, what you are full of

example.name: full-j: both args
example.text: Most gangs in London are full of blacks .

roleset.note: FULL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP (from full.02-j)
